Detailed Description

(Private) Methods to manage XML attributes.

XMLATTR.C -- (Private) Methods to manage XML attributes.

Author:
Mike Fitzpatrick and Eric Timmermann and Ken Mighell

8/03/09

8/18/14 KJM: added function xml_attrNames

char *  name 
)

Get an attribute's value (private method).

xml_attrGet -- Get an attribute's value (private method).

Parameters:
*ablock An AttrBlock to insert these attributes
*name A string that hold the name of an attribute
Returns:
Value of the attribute or NULL

status xml_attrSet ( AttrBlock *  ablock,
char *  name,
char *  value 
)

Set/Create an attributes (private method).

xml_attrSet -- Set/Create an attributes (private method).

Parameters:
ablock An AttrBlock to insert these attributes.
name A string that hold the name of an attribute.
value A string that hold the value of an attribute.
Returns:
The status of the request. 1 Success, 0=FAIL.
Warning:
If an attribute has no name/value, this will not create it.

char * xml_attrXML ( AttrBlock *  ablock  ) 

Get the attributes for an XML tag (private method).

Get names of the attributes for an XML tag (private method).

xml_attrXML -- Get the attributes for an XML tag (private method).

Parameters:
*ablock An AttrBlock to insert these attributes
Returns:
A string containing the attributes for an XML tag
xml_attrNames -- Get the names of the attributes for an XML tag (private method).

Parameters:
*ablock An AttrBlock to insert these attributes
Returns:
A space-separated string containing the names of the attributes for an XML tag
